title: Sound On: GOP Offers Short-Term Debt Ceiling Deal
itunes:title: Sound On: GOP Offers Short-Term Debt Ceiling Deal
description:
Guests: New York Republican Congresswoman Nicole Malliotakis, Bill McGinley, Principal at The Vogel Group, Bloomberg Politic Contributor and Jeanne Sheehan Zaino, Robert Costa, Washington Post reporter and author of "Peril."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
